ABOUT ME

â€œ

Find the story. Know the story, Distill the story. Only then should you make visual decisions on how to tell the story. The best design begins with story.

- Leland Moschmeyer

Hi, I'm Aimen. I'm a recent computer science graduate with a huge passion for UI/UX Design. From researching and experimenting, Minimalism is designed around the content. Focus and purpose is key when it comes to making minimalism work.

I have studied information technology over 6 years. I started learning the basics of design is my second year of univeristy (2015). I took up the challenge to continue self learn design.

The goal is to become a full stack web developer where I can work on a project from start to finish and make contributions through every stage of the development phase.

When I'm not designing, I shift my creativity into photography.
